content.raw: ya, the [terrain skirts](http://www.ogre3d.org/docs/api/2.0/class_ogre_1_1_terrain_global_options.html#a1edb0e8e24ef3f8d7ef698b88eb97613) are actually not part of the terrain surface and so the ogre terrain's ray intersection function we use doesn't return any results. We'll need write our own logic for handling this. I think it's already a problem on gazebo7 before the fix. We can ticket this issue and tackle it later.
